title: Why is the lol PBE signups closed ??
body: I am interested in creating a PBE account , yet when I go to apply , it shows that the signups are closed ? Is there a limit to how many can be on the PBE or something ?

replies.body: The website is currently down for maintenance! While we investigate the matter, I recommend keeping your eyes peeled on our [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for when it'd be back up.

> [{quoted}](name=Prynce,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zjEhKPh9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-03T04:37:07.858+0000)
>
> The website is currently down for maintenance! While we investigate the matter, I recommend keeping your eyes peeled on our [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for when it'd be back up.

Any clue when the PBE signups are coming off of maintenance? Like maybe in the next week?
Why are closed I have pbe i not acc what i signups are closed{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
